thread.title: DEBBIE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by DEBBIE

author: DEBBIE
title: DEBBIE
text: I rang quite a lot of hire companies,one even said"Good Luck if you can get a car with 0 excess"My husband hired one from Brisbane 18months ago,he was very impressed.They upgraded him to a larger car,as all that was left in a small car was the colour pink.The girls couldn't see a truck driver in that one.He will be hiring another car in June at Brisbane airport with our son to see Willowbank Drag Racing at Ipswich.I have told a lot of people about the cost,they are amazed at the difference in pricing.Thanks very much for your service.Debbie Allgood.
